structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Atypical Working Arrangements Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of atypical working arrangements including non-standard work locations, schedules, and time patterns for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Work at home
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who perform their work primarily from their home or residence.

structure:Code.common:Name: Evening work
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work during evening hours outside of standard daytime working periods.

structure:Code.common:Name: Night work
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work during night hours, typically between 10 PM and 6 AM.

structure:Code.common:Name: Saturday work
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work on Saturdays as part of their regular or occasional work schedule.

structure:Code.common:Name: Sunday work
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work on Sundays as part of their regular or occasional work schedule.

structure:Code.common:Name: Shift-work (employees only)
structure:Code.common:Description: Employees who work in rotating or fixed shift patterns, excluding self-employed persons.
